definition: to clearly indicate
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
to register/to annotate/note/comment
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: We has carried out systematic studies to characterize the condition inside the shoes in terms of hygienics.
sentences.chinese: 我们在鞋内卫生方面完成了系统研究，并注明了条件。

sentences.english: If the results are not for the current year, please indicate that the year of the entry.
sentences.chinese: 如非本年度所考获之成绩，请注明应考年份。

sentences.english: If seller's designs are used, the design numbers must be stated in full.
sentences.chinese: 若选用卖方花样，必须详细注明花号。

sentences.english: Please specify the mentioned shipment is for R9.
sentences.chinese: 请注明所提到的货物为R9是。

sentences.english: Please indicate the consignor and consignee in the contract.
sentences.chinese: 请在合同中注明发货方及收货方。

sentences.english: Commercial Invoice in three originals manually signed indicating contract number.
sentences.chinese: 手签的商业发票，三份原件，注明合同号。

sentences.english: He used it in dating his letter, then once again in the text.
sentences.chinese: 他在信中用这个符号注明日期，然后再次用在文本中。

sentences.english: The packing list should be indicated with shipping weight number and date of corresponding invoice.
sentences.chinese: 装箱单上应注明发货量及相应发票的编号和日期。

sentences.english: Female applicant pregnant if yes date of L. M. P.
sentences.chinese: 女申请者是否怀孕？如是，注明最后月经日期。

sentences.english: Check mark the date you plan to take the Three Refuges.
sentences.chinese: 若参加三皈依，请注明日期。

sentences.english: ii. A bill of lading indicating that transhipment will or may take place is acceptable, even if the credit prohibits transhipment
sentences.chinese: 银行可以接受注明将要发生或可能发生转运的提单。

sentences.english: Commercial Invoice in five copies, stating contract number, L/C number and mark.
sentences.chinese: 商业发票一式五份，注明合同号，信用证号和唛头。

sentences.english: Translation without acknowledgement is not acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 未注明翻译也是接受的。

sentences.english: If studying, please state 'STUDENT' and name of the School.
sentences.chinese: 如属学生，请注明学校名称及就讀班级。

sentences.english: Cheques should be crossed and made payable to "Queen Self Storage Company Limited".
sentences.chinese: 支票应予划线，并注明支付“皇后自存仓有限公司”。

definition: to mark/to indicate
remark/note
to mark out/to tag/to put a sign on sth explaining or calling attention to/to annotate (e.g. a character with its pinyin)
to sign (a signature)
to state explicitly in writing/to specify/to stipulate
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
attached/included herewith
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
to authorize
beard/mustache/feeler (of an insect etc)/tassel
must/to have to/to wait
scope of authority/mandate
in writing/written
must/to need to/to be sure to
the author takes sole responsibility for the views expressed here (disclaimer)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
